name: Foto Frenzy: Spot the Difference
description:
Nintendo.com Description (from Ad Blurbs)

Spot the differences in over 200 puzzles!



Everyone knows it, everyone loves it! Foto Frenzy! Using your Nintendo DS stylus, find the difference between the two pictures. Hundreds of puzzles, a variety of modes, and hours of fun make this a “must-have” game for your DS collection! Compete against your friends in a fast paced battle to see who is the “spot the difference” champ!
